title: Smallest Common Region
description:
You are given some lists of regions where the first region of each list includes all other regions in that list.
Naturally, if a region x contains another region y then x is bigger than y. Also, by definition, a region x contains itself.
Given two regions: region1 and region2, return the smallest region that contains both of them.
If you are given regions r1, r2, and r3 such that r1 includes r3, it is guaranteed there is no r2 such that r2 includes r3.
It is guaranteed the smallest region exists.
 
Example 1:

Input:
regions = [["Earth","North America","South America"],
["North America","United States","Canada"],
["United States","New York","Boston"],
["Canada","Ontario","Quebec"],
["South America","Brazil"]],
region1 = "Quebec",
region2 = "New York"
Output: "North America"

Example 2:

Input: regions = [["Earth", "North America", "South America"],["North America", "United States", "Canada"],["United States", "New York", "Boston"],["Canada", "Ontario", "Quebec"],["South America", "Brazil"]], region1 = "Canada", region2 = "South America"
Output: "Earth"

 
Constraints:

2 <= regions.length <= 104
2 <= regions[i].length <= 20
1 <= regions[i][j].length, region1.length, region2.length <= 20
region1 != region2
regions[i][j], region1, and region2 consist of English letters.
The input is generated such that there exists a region which contains all the other regions, either directly or indirectly.
starter_code:
class Solution:
    def findSmallestRegion(self, regions: List[List[str]], region1: str, region2: str) -> str:
preamble:
from typing import *
from collections import *
from functools import *
from itertools import *
from heapq import *
from bisect import *
from math import *
import math, collections, functools, itertools, bisect, heapq, string, re
check_function:
def check(candidate):
    assert candidate(regions = [['Global', 'Zone1', 'Zone2'], ['Zone1', 'Area1', 'Area2'], ['Area1', 'Location1', 'Location2'], ['Area2', 'Location3', 'Location4'], ['Zone2', 'Area3', 'Area4']],region1 = "Location1",region2 = "Area4") == "Global"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Region1', 'Region2'], ['Region1', 'SubRegion1', 'SubRegion2'], ['Region2', 'SubRegion3', 'SubRegion4'], ['SubRegion1', 'SubSubRegion1', 'SubSubRegion2']],region1 = "SubSubRegion1",region2 = "SubRegion3") == "World"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Continent', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Country1', 'City1', 'City2'], ['Country2', 'City3', 'City4'], ['City1', 'District1', 'District2'], ['City3', 'District3', 'District4']],region1 = "District2",region2 = "District4") == "Continent"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Globe', 'Region1', 'Region2'], ['Region1', 'SubRegion1.1', 'SubRegion1.2'], ['Region2', 'SubRegion2.1', 'SubRegion2.2'], ['SubRegion1.1', 'SubSubRegion1.1.1', 'SubSubRegion1.1.2'], ['SubRegion2.1', 'SubSubRegion2.1.1', 'SubSubRegion2.1.2']],region1 = "SubSubRegion1.1.1",region2 = "SubSubRegion2.1.1") == "Globe"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Globe', 'Africa', 'Antarctica'], ['Africa', 'Egypt', 'Kenya'], ['Antarctica', 'East Antarctica', 'West Antarctica'], ['Egypt', 'Cairo'], ['Kenya', 'Nairobi']],region1 = "Cairo",region2 = "Nairobi") == "Africa"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Globe', 'Americas', 'Eurasia'], ['Americas', 'USA', 'Canada'], ['Eurasia', 'Europe', 'Asia'], ['USA', 'California', 'Texas'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China']],region1 = "California",region2 = "India") == "Globe"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Global', 'Region1', 'Region2'], ['Region1', 'SubRegion1', 'SubRegion2'], ['Region2', 'SubRegion3', 'SubRegion4'], ['SubRegion1', 'SubSubRegion1', 'SubSubRegion2'], ['SubRegion3', 'SubSubRegion3', 'SubSubRegion4']],region1 = "SubSubRegion1",region2 = "SubSubRegion3") == "Global"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Global', 'Continent1', 'Continent2'], ['Continent1', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Country1', 'City1', 'City2'], ['Continent2', 'Country3', 'Country4']],region1 = "City1",region2 = "Country4") == "Global"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'NorthAmerica', 'SouthAmerica'], ['NorthAmerica', 'USA', 'Canada'], ['USA', 'NY', 'CA'], ['Canada', 'ON', 'QC'], ['SouthAmerica', 'Brazil']],region1 = "QC",region2 = "NY") == "NorthAmerica"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Global', 'Continent1', 'Continent2'], ['Continent1', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Continent2', 'Country3', 'Country4'], ['Country1', 'City1', 'City2'], ['Country2', 'City3', 'City4'], ['Country3', 'City5', 'City6'], ['Country4', 'City7', 'City8']],region1 = "City1",region2 = "City7") == "Global"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Universe', 'Milky Way', 'Andromeda'], ['Milky Way', 'Solar System', 'Proxima Centauri System'], ['Solar System', 'Earth', 'Mars'], ['Earth', 'North America', 'Europe'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France']],region1 = "France",region2 = "Mars") == "Solar System"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Continent1', 'Continent2'], ['Continent1', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Country1', 'City1', 'City2'], ['Country2', 'City3', 'City4'], ['Continent2', 'Country3', 'Country4']],region1 = "City1",region2 = "Country4") == "World"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Globe', 'Continental USA', 'Canada'], ['Continental USA', 'Northeast', 'Southeast'], ['Northeast', 'New York', 'New Jersey'], ['Southeast', 'Florida', 'Georgia'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec']],region1 = "New Jersey",region2 = "Ontario") == "Globe"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Europe', 'Asia'], ['Europe', 'France', 'Germany'], ['Asia', 'China', 'Japan'], ['France', 'Paris', 'Lyon'], ['Japan', 'Tokyo', 'Kyoto']],region1 = "Lyon",region2 = "Tokyo") == "World"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Earth', 'North America', 'South America'], ['North America', 'United States', 'Canada'], ['United States', 'New York', 'Boston'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec'], ['South America', 'Brazil']],region1 = "Quebec",region2 = "New York") == "North America"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Asia', 'Europe'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['India', 'Delhi', 'Mumbai'], ['China', 'Beijing', 'Shanghai']],region1 = "Delhi",region2 = "Beijing") == "Asia"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Continent', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Country1', 'City1.1', 'City1.2'], ['Country2', 'City2.1', 'City2.2'], ['City1.1', 'District1.1.1', 'District1.1.2'], ['City2.1', 'District2.1.1', 'District2.1.2']],region1 = "District1.1.1",region2 = "District2.1.1") == "Continent"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Asia', 'Europe'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['India', 'Delhi', 'Mumbai'], ['China', 'Beijing', 'Shanghai']],region1 = "France",region2 = "Mumbai") == "World"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Universe', 'Galaxy1', 'Galaxy2'], ['Galaxy1', 'StarSystem1', 'StarSystem2'], ['Galaxy2', 'StarSystem3', 'StarSystem4'], ['StarSystem1', 'Planet1', 'Planet2'], ['StarSystem2', 'Planet3', 'Planet4']],region1 = "Planet1",region2 = "Planet4") == "Galaxy1"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Earth', 'North America', 'South America'], ['North America', 'United States', 'Canada'], ['United States', 'New York', 'Boston'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec'], ['South America', 'Brazil']],region1 = "Canada",region2 = "South America") == "Earth"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Region1', 'Region2'], ['Region1', 'SubRegion1', 'SubRegion2'], ['SubRegion1', 'SubSubRegion1', 'SubSubRegion2'], ['Region2', 'SubRegion3', 'SubRegion4']],region1 = "SubSubRegion1",region2 = "SubRegion3") == "World"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Europe', 'Asia'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['Asia', 'Japan', 'South Korea'], ['Germany', 'Berlin', 'Munich'], ['France', 'Paris', 'Lyon'], ['Japan', 'Tokyo', 'Osaka'], ['South Korea', 'Seoul', 'Busan']],region1 = "Berlin",region2 = "Tokyo") == "World"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Universe', 'Sector1', 'Sector2'], ['Sector1', 'ClusterA', 'ClusterB'], ['ClusterA', 'System1', 'System2'], ['ClusterB', 'System3', 'System4'], ['Sector2', 'ClusterC', 'ClusterD']],region1 = "System2",region2 = "ClusterD") == "Universe"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Global', 'Region1', 'Region2'], ['Region1', 'SubRegion1.1', 'SubRegion1.2'], ['Region2', 'SubRegion2.1', 'SubRegion2.2'], ['SubRegion1.1', 'SubSubRegion1.1.1', 'SubSubRegion1.1.2'], ['SubRegion2.1', 'SubSubRegion2.1.1', 'SubSubRegion2.1.2']],region1 = "SubSubRegion1.1.1",region2 = "SubSubRegion2.1.1") == "Global"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'NorthAmerica', 'SouthAmerica'], ['NorthAmerica', 'USA', 'Canada'], ['USA', 'NY', 'CA'], ['Canada', 'ON', 'QC'], ['SouthAmerica', 'Brazil']],region1 = "Canada",region2 = "SouthAmerica") == "World"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Universe', 'Milky Way', 'Andromeda'], ['Milky Way', 'Earth', 'Mars'], ['Andromeda', 'Alpha Andromedae'], ['Earth', 'Asia', 'Europe'], ['Mars', 'Phobos', 'Deimos']],region1 = "Asia",region2 = "Phobos") == "Milky Way"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Continents', 'Europe', 'Asia'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China']],region1 = "Germany",region2 = "China") == "Continents"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Global', 'Continent1', 'Continent2'], ['Continent1', 'CountryA', 'CountryB'], ['CountryA', 'City1', 'City2'], ['CountryB', 'City3', 'City4'], ['Continent2', 'CountryC', 'CountryD']],region1 = "City1",region2 = "City3") == "Continent1"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Globe', 'Hemisphere1', 'Hemisphere2'], ['Hemisphere1', 'Zone1', 'Zone2'], ['Hemisphere2', 'Zone3', 'Zone4'], ['Zone1', 'Area1', 'Area2'], ['Zone2', 'Area3', 'Area4']],region1 = "Area1",region2 = "Area4") == "Hemisphere1"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Continent', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Country1', 'CityA', 'CityB'], ['Country2', 'CityC', 'CityD'], ['CityA', 'Town1', 'Town2'], ['CityB', 'Town3', 'Town4']],region1 = "Town1",region2 = "Town4") == "Country1"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'RegionA', 'RegionB'], ['RegionA', 'SubRegionA1', 'SubRegionA2'], ['SubRegionA1', 'CityA1', 'CityA2'], ['SubRegionA2', 'CityA3', 'CityA4'], ['RegionB', 'SubRegionB1', 'SubRegionB2']],region1 = "SubRegionA1",region2 = "SubRegionB2") == "World"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Region1', 'Region2'], ['Region1', 'SubRegion1', 'SubRegion2'], ['Region2', 'SubRegion3', 'SubRegion4'], ['SubRegion1', 'SubSubRegion1', 'SubSubRegion2'], ['SubRegion3', 'SubSubRegion3', 'SubSubRegion4']],region1 = "SubSubRegion1",region2 = "SubSubRegion3") == "World"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Earth', 'North America', 'South America'], ['North America', 'United States', 'Canada'], ['United States', 'New York', 'Boston'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec'], ['South America', 'Brazil']],region1 = "Quebec",region2 = "New York") == "North America"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Asia', 'Europe'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['India', 'Delhi', 'Mumbai'], ['China', 'Beijing', 'Shanghai']],region1 = "Delhi",region2 = "Beijing") == "Asia"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Earth', 'North America', 'South America'], ['North America', 'United States', 'Canada'], ['United States', 'New York', 'Boston'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec'], ['South America', 'Brazil']],region1 = "Canada",region2 = "South America") == "Earth"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Universal', 'Galaxy1', 'Galaxy2'], ['Galaxy1', 'StarSystemA', 'StarSystemB'], ['StarSystemA', 'PlanetX', 'PlanetY'], ['StarSystemB', 'PlanetZ', 'PlanetW'], ['Galaxy2', 'StarSystemC', 'StarSystemD']],region1 = "PlanetX",region2 = "PlanetZ") == "Galaxy1"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Galaxy', 'SolarSystem1', 'SolarSystem2'], ['SolarSystem1', 'Planet1', 'Planet2'], ['SolarSystem2', 'Planet3', 'Planet4'], ['Planet1', 'Moon1', 'Moon2'], ['Planet3', 'Moon3', 'Moon4']],region1 = "Moon1",region2 = "Moon3") == "Galaxy"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Asia', 'Europe'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['India', 'Delhi', 'Mumbai'], ['China', 'Beijing', 'Shanghai']],region1 = "Delhi",region2 = "Shanghai") == "Asia"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Universe', 'Galaxy1', 'Galaxy2'], ['Galaxy1', 'StarSystem1', 'StarSystem2'], ['Galaxy2', 'StarSystem3', 'StarSystem4'], ['StarSystem1', 'Planet1', 'Planet2'], ['StarSystem2', 'Planet3', 'Planet4']],region1 = "Planet1",region2 = "Planet3") == "Galaxy1"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Asia', 'Europe'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China'], ['Europe', 'France', 'Germany'], ['India', 'Delhi', 'Mumbai'], ['China', 'Beijing', 'Shanghai']],region1 = "Delhi",region2 = "Shanghai") == "Asia"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Globe', 'Continent1', 'Continent2'], ['Continent1', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Continent2', 'Country3', 'Country4'], ['Country1', 'City1', 'City2'], ['Country2', 'City3', 'City4'], ['Country3', 'City5', 'City6'], ['Country4', 'City7', 'City8']],region1 = "City2",region2 = "City7") == "Globe"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Universe', 'Galaxy1', 'Galaxy2'], ['Galaxy1', 'SolarSystem1', 'SolarSystem2'], ['Galaxy2', 'SolarSystem3', 'SolarSystem4'], ['SolarSystem1', 'Earth', 'Mars'], ['SolarSystem2', 'Jupiter', 'Saturn'], ['SolarSystem3', 'Uranus', 'Neptune'], ['SolarSystem4', 'Pluto', 'Haumea']],region1 = "Earth",region2 = "Jupiter") == "Galaxy1"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Continent', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Country1', 'State1', 'State2'], ['Country2', 'State3', 'State4'], ['State1', 'City1', 'City2'], ['State3', 'City3', 'City4']],region1 = "City1",region2 = "City3") == "Continent"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Universal', 'Galaxy1', 'Galaxy2'], ['Galaxy1', 'Planet1', 'Planet2'], ['Planet1', 'Moon1', 'Moon2'], ['Galaxy2', 'Planet3', 'Planet4']],region1 = "Moon1",region2 = "Planet3") == "Universal"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Europe', 'Africa'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['Africa', 'Egypt', 'Nigeria'], ['Germany', 'Berlin', 'Munich'], ['France', 'Paris', 'Lyon'], ['Egypt', 'Cairo', 'Alexandria'], ['Nigeria', 'Lagos', 'Abuja']],region1 = "Berlin",region2 = "Lagos") == "World"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Asia', 'Africa'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China'], ['Africa', 'Egypt', 'Kenya'], ['India', 'Delhi', 'Mumbai'], ['China', 'Beijing', 'Shanghai'], ['Egypt', 'Cairo', 'Giza']],region1 = "Delhi",region2 = "Shanghai") == "Asia"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Asia', 'Europe'], ['Asia', 'China', 'India'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['China', 'Beijing', 'Shanghai'], ['India', 'Mumbai', 'Delhi'], ['Germany', 'Berlin', 'Munich'], ['France', 'Paris', 'Lyon']],region1 = "Beijing",region2 = "Mumbai") == "Asia"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Continent', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Country1', 'State1', 'State2'], ['Country2', 'State3', 'State4'], ['State1', 'City1', 'City2'], ['State2', 'City3', 'City4']],region1 = "City2",region2 = "City3") == "Country1"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Asia', 'Europe'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['India', 'Mumbai', 'Delhi'], ['China', 'Shanghai', 'Beijing']],region1 = "Mumbai",region2 = "Beijing") == "Asia"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Earth', 'North America', 'South America'], ['North America', 'United States', 'Canada'], ['United States', 'New York', 'Boston'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec'], ['South America', 'Brazil']],region1 = "Canada",region2 = "South America") == "Earth"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Asia', 'Europe'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['India', 'Delhi', 'Mumbai'], ['China', 'Beijing', 'Shanghai'], ['Germany', 'Berlin', 'Hamburg'], ['France', 'Paris', 'Lyon']],region1 = "Delhi",region2 = "Beijing") == "Asia"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Asia', 'Africa'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China'], ['Africa', 'Egypt', 'Nigeria'], ['China', 'Beijing', 'Shanghai']],region1 = "Beijing",region2 = "Nigeria") == "World"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Globe', 'Continent1', 'Continent2'], ['Continent1', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Continent2', 'Country3', 'Country4'], ['Country1', 'City1', 'City2'], ['Country2', 'City3', 'City4']],region1 = "City1",region2 = "City4") == "Continent1"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Asia', 'Africa'], ['Asia', 'India', 'China'], ['Africa', 'Egypt', 'Nigeria'], ['India', 'Delhi', 'Mumbai'], ['China', 'Beijing', 'Shanghai']],region1 = "Delhi",region2 = "Shanghai") == "Asia"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Global', 'Region1', 'Region2'], ['Region1', 'SubRegion1', 'SubRegion2'], ['Region2', 'SubRegion3', 'SubRegion4'], ['SubRegion1', 'City1', 'City2'], ['SubRegion2', 'City3', 'City4']],region1 = "City1",region2 = "City4") == "Region1"
    assert candidate(regions = [['World', 'Europe', 'Asia'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France'], ['Asia', 'Japan', 'China'], ['Germany', 'Berlin', 'Munich'], ['France', 'Lyon', 'Paris']],region1 = "Berlin",region2 = "Paris") == "Europe"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Universe', 'Galaxy1', 'Galaxy2'], ['Galaxy1', 'StarSystem1', 'StarSystem2'], ['StarSystem1', 'Planet1', 'Planet2'], ['Galaxy2', 'StarSystem3'], ['StarSystem3', 'Planet3', 'Planet4']],region1 = "Planet2",region2 = "Planet4") == "Universe"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Galaxy', 'Solar System'], ['Solar System', 'Earth', 'Mars'], ['Earth', 'Asia', 'Europe'], ['Mars', 'Phobos', 'Deimos']],region1 = "Europe",region2 = "Phobos") == "Solar System"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Global', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Country1', 'State1', 'State2'], ['State1', 'City1', 'City2'], ['Country2', 'State3'], ['State3', 'City3', 'City4']],region1 = "City2",region2 = "City4") == "Global"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Globe', 'Continent1', 'Continent2'], ['Continent1', 'Country1', 'Country2'], ['Continent2', 'Country3', 'Country4'], ['Country1', 'City1', 'City2'], ['Country2', 'City3', 'City4']],region1 = "City1",region2 = "City3") == "Continent1"
    assert candidate(regions = [['Continent', 'Region1', 'Region2'], ['Region1', 'Area1', 'Area2'], ['Area1', 'Subarea1', 'Subarea2'], ['Region2', 'Area3'], ['Area3', 'Subarea3', 'Subarea4']],region1 = "Subarea2",region2 = "Subarea4") == "Continent"
test_cases: assert candidate(regions = [['Universe', 'Milky Way', 'Andromeda'], ['Milky Way', 'Solar System', 'Proxima Centauri System'], ['Solar System', 'Earth', 'Mars'], ['Earth', 'North America', 'Europe'], ['Europe', 'Germany', 'France']],region1 = "France",region2 = "Mars") == "Solar System"

assert candidate(regions = [['Globe', 'Continental USA', 'Canada'], ['Continental USA', 'Northeast', 'Southeast'], ['Northeast', 'New York', 'New Jersey'], ['Southeast', 'Florida', 'Georgia'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec']],region1 = "New Jersey",region2 = "Ontario") == "Globe"

assert candidate(regions = [['Earth', 'North America', 'South America'], ['North America', 'United States', 'Canada'], ['United States', 'New York', 'Boston'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec'], ['South America', 'Brazil']],region1 = "Quebec",region2 = "New York") == "North America"

assert candidate(regions = [['Earth', 'North America', 'South America'], ['North America', 'United States', 'Canada'], ['United States', 'New York', 'Boston'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec'], ['South America', 'Brazil']],region1 = "Canada",region2 = "South America") == "Earth"

assert candidate(regions = [['Universe', 'Milky Way', 'Andromeda'], ['Milky Way', 'Earth', 'Mars'], ['Andromeda', 'Alpha Andromedae'], ['Earth', 'Asia', 'Europe'], ['Mars', 'Phobos', 'Deimos']],region1 = "Asia",region2 = "Phobos") == "Milky Way"

assert candidate(regions = [['Earth', 'North America', 'South America'], ['North America', 'United States', 'Canada'], ['United States', 'New York', 'Boston'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec'], ['South America', 'Brazil']],region1 = "Quebec",region2 = "New York") == "North America"

assert candidate(regions = [['Earth', 'North America', 'South America'], ['North America', 'United States', 'Canada'], ['United States', 'New York', 'Boston'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec'], ['South America', 'Brazil']],region1 = "Canada",region2 = "South America") == "Earth"

assert candidate(regions = [['Earth', 'North America', 'South America'], ['North America', 'United States', 'Canada'], ['United States', 'New York', 'Boston'], ['Canada', 'Ontario', 'Quebec'], ['South America', 'Brazil']],region1 = "Canada",region2 = "South America") == "Earth"
